balaporoththu rahitha lesa garbhanibhawayata lakwima ha wenath aasadhana roga waladima nawathwimata wedya widyawa diyunu bawa aththa.namuth, me kisima prathikarmayak siyayata siyayakma sarthaka nathibawa oonama wedyawarayekugen obata danagannata puluwan.oba biya wiya yuthu karanawa nam eya noweyi.wiwahayata pera lingika sabadatha pawathwala, mona hithakin eeta passe thama pawul jiwithaya aarambha karannada…?
‘sihinayaki ra’ wadasatahanata apa kruthagnyathawa palakala yuththe me githayata wedikawak nirmanaya karadima arabaya ya.
ajinomoto pakattuwak krushi rasayana drawya mishra karana tankiyata damana gowiyan boho deneku ma daka thibenawa.
horu allanna mata sahaya denna…
ee asse thawa ulkapatha warshawak enawa desambar wisiganan walath..
naha .mata yamak labenna thiyenawa nam eeka ma kara pamineyi kiyala hithanawa misa ee pasupasa hambaayame puruddak mata kawadawath thibune naha.
ee nisa madurage wade ee tharam amaru naha.
kenekta oone kamak thiyenawanm yamak karanna puluwan.hoya gannath puluwan.
eyage thaththa ekala yudha hamudawe thuwakku repayar anshaye lokka wa sitiyeya .
liyapu kawiya thawa poddak mahansi wela aayeth kiyawala sakas kaloth oya tika hada ganna puluwan.
eya wenas wiya yuthumaya.

aparade sama oya kiyapu jathiye unda yudde kale thibuna nam kollo ki dahak berilada ...
eeka thamayi ban mama me kalpana kale."

therum kamituwa me tharagawaliyata eya nam kale na – hathuru mali gana kiyayi
mun aayojana kiyanne makkada, naya kiyanne makkada, yati thala pahasukam kiyanne makkada kiyawath danne nathi wahelaya. .
api ape daru pawul nadaththu karanne me wagawalin labena aadayamen.
mowun wamanaya saha pachana thaththwayakin pelena bawada ohu sandahan kala.
digatama kalawe niyalenna balaporoththu wenawada?
sandaha siya dayakathwaya laba denawa.
ewani wadapiliwelaka niyamu karyabharaya itukala yuththe pudgalaya nowa danum paddhathiyak ha in ipadunu shikshanaya wisini.
mokada api eekata welasaninma lasthi nisa.
shri lankawa, kasakasthanaya, oomanaya, china thayipe, bangladeshaya, honkon, thayilanthaya saha afganisthanaya mewara tharagawaliyata ekwi sitiyi.
ee wage thamayi meka.}}

""apal siri katahanda handunagena pilithuru dime mrudukangaya asarthakayi kiyala mata hithenawa....androyid meheyum paddhathiye katahanda handunagena pilithuru dime hakiyawa apal siri mrudukangayata wada boho ihalayi...."...udaharanayak widiyata mama wahanaya padawana gaman mage ayifonaye siri wadasatahanata mage priyathama awanhale nama kiyala eyata amathumak ganna kiwwoth boho welawata dethun parak kiwwath sirita mage widhanaya therumganna ba...eeth mage androyid fon ekata ekaparak kiwwama hariyata therum aragena amathuma sambandha karanawa......me durwalathawaya nisa apal siri mrudukangaye prayogika prayojana aduyi..."

bahutharaya wana sinhala jathiya da pradhana sulu jathiya wana demala jathiya da, dewana sulu jathiya wana muslim jathiya da: deshapalanika, sanskruthika gatum thulin dirgha kalayak mululle gaman kara, wiya yuthu aakarayenma nima nowu gatumaka eelanga awadiya wana prachandathwaya dakwa gaman karamin minis jiwitha dasa dahas gananakda, gananaya kala nohaki samajiya ha aarthika wyayasanayanda athi karamin, gatum nirakaranaya kara ganime mawath wetha awathiranaya wime itha sulu ho wibhawayak nopenwamin gaman karamin siti.

therena bhashawen me kiyanne api denna ge edineda rakiyawa sandaha karana mulu gaman kalaya awama karaganna nam ekko dennama manthuma ge wadapola langa nathnam hamine ge wadapola langa deken ekaka padinchi wenna oona.api denna mulinma hithuwa mage sewasthanaya langa thanak hoya ganna.me sandaha ee dawaswala thibunu samanya kramaya thamayi irida paththarayak aragena eeke luhundu danwim balala ee anuwa hoya balana eka.

kunakatuwa, mukalan munakatuwa, pala polanga wage sarpayo mada wisha thiyena sarpayo widihata thama hadunwala thiyenne.me sarpayo dashta kirimen wena haniya sarpaya matha ha sharirayata athuluwena wisha pramanaya matha rada pawathinawa.sarpayek dashta karapu sthanaye wedanawa idimima siduwenawa.sarpaya athakata kakulakata dashta kala nam, ethana athiwena idimuma samanya athaka ehemath nathnam kakulaka pramanayen bagekata wada idimila nam godak wisha athul wela thiyenawa.sarpa dashta kirimakin passe ena roga lakshana sarpayagen sarpayata wenas wenawa.-

uthure militarikaranayak athi bawatath, hamuda sebalun mangin ema palathe nadaththu katayuthu karagena yana bawatath nangena chodana aarakshaka lekam gotabhaya rajapaksha mahatha wisin tharaye prathikshepa karanu labe.ee pamanak nowa shri lankawe disthrikka wisi deka thulama ebandu hamuda balapamak nathayi aarakshaka lekamwaraya thawaduratath penwa deyi.masa 30kata pera yuddhaya jaya ganimen pasuwath aanduwa hamuda kandawuruwalin uthura purawa athayi yanuwen demala deshapalana paksha ha dayasporawa idiripath kara athi chodanawakata pilithuru demin aarakshaka lekamwaraya me bawa prakasha kaleya.wasara thihaka thrasthawadi yuddhaya awasan karamin keti kalayak thula samanya thaththwayakata path kara maha parimanaye sanwardhanayak uthure athi kara thibena bawada rajapaksha mahatha sandahan kaleya.
grika rajyaya janapriya panthin samaga, enam thamangema janathawa samaga, dashaka gananawak thisse akhanda yuddhayaka niyali sitiyeya.
deshayak ese nomathinam boho minisun pirisakage yahapatha wenuweni.
